Find it in your podcast app and here on YouTube: https://t.co/7NrTd1n42p

James's autobiography Animal House is out now. Get signed copies: https://t.co/ICw3oWY35c https://t.co/P7rOpPjsOo

@mrallansmith We think we know what it is but need our web guy to take a look at it. He’s in Canada so there’s a time difference to factor in. But we’ll get on it ASAP. In the meantime could you drop a very brief ‘hi, website problem’ email to hello@thesquareball.net so we can pick it up? Ta!

data.text:

The secret, Rapha said after winning his first cap, was “Tite asked me to do what I did with Leeds.”

urls.title: TSB 2023 charity calendar • The Square Ball
urls.description: It's nearly 2023, so it's nearly time for a new year and a new calendar, filled with pictures of your favourite Leeds players, by your favourite TSB artists, with all the profits going to the Leeds Cancer Centre and the Leeds Breast Cancer Awareness Group. PLEASE READ: Important Delivery Info These calendars are A3 size and heavy, meaning we're limited with how to post them. Please don't try to combine these with any other products in one order. In the UK, you can buy two calendars per order. Outside the UK, you can buy one calendar per order. If you try to add more to your basket, the order will not go through the checkout. (You can place as many orders as you like.) We know this is a bit annoying, so thank you for bearing with us! We post orders out a few times a week, so in the UK we charge 2nd Class postage, but we will use Royal Mail Tracked 48 to send your order. For Europe/Rest of World — we know it's expensive, but we strongly advise using the Tracked Delivery service to make s

data.text:
Definitely buy a calendar. 

It will look ace on your wall and all the profits go to the Leeds Cancer Centre and the Leeds Breast Cancer Awareness Group. 

https://t.co/B8tpUCG0Vq https://t.co/JRujzgZcTI

Klich, 32, wouldn't be a DP. @UEFAComPiotrK first on interest. Klich has 42 caps with Poland. Joined Leeds in 2018, has 192 apps. https://t.co/ph31mvT3SS
@TheSquareBall Sure, it’s 220601! Thanks lads

urls.title: Football Clichés - Carriageworks Theatre
urls.description: Hyde Park Book Club & The Square Ball present Football Clichés  What the are unwritten rules of co-commentary? Who are the most boo-able team in the country? What’s the most “assistant referee” name possible? What are the traditional contents of a player’s proverbial “locker”? What’s the best red-card brandishing technique? And what specific footballing situations […]

tweets.text:
After a sold out Uk & Ireland tour, Football Clichés are coming to Leeds, with special guests, Leeds own @TheSquareBall & @PhilHay_ ⚽️ 

Join us for a deep dive into the subconscious code of the world's most talked-about and written-about sport.

Tkts: https://t.co/FQGIdg1UNd https://t.co/l7LU5DGJY6
@TheSquareBall hi lads, ordered a calender nearly two weeks ago, just wondering when I can expect it to arrive? Cheers

urls.title: Recalling Boro's near miss away crush against Leeds in 1989
urls.description: It was 30 years ago today that terrified away fans had to scramble over spiked fences at Ayresome Park to escape a crush

tweets.text:
#OnThisBoroDay - 1989 - a chilling moment: a frightening near miss as #Leeds fans are caught in a scary crush at Ayresome Park, just months after Hillsborough. When all fans were routinely treated as cattle. Here's an old #Boro flashback bit: 

https://t.co/U6Obaxp1t8

urls.title: TEAM OF INTERNATIONALS | Varley Media
urls.description: Leeds United were a team of internationals in the early Seventies. Pictured, back row, are: Paul Madeley, Allan Clarke, Terry Yorath, Eddie Gray and Gary Sprake. Front row: Mick Jones, Paul Reaney, Peter Lorimer, Johnny Giles and Billy Bremner.

urls.title: Fae Raploch to Elland Road
urls.description: William John Bremner, known as Billy, was born in Stirling on 9 December 1942. He lived at 35a Weir Street in the Raploch in the shadow of Stirling Castle with his adopted parents Pop and Bessie Bremner. Billy signed for Leeds United shortly after his 17th birthday on 12th December 1959 and made his senior […]

tweets.text: @TheSquareBall @varleyphotos For more great images of Billy and the story of Billy’s early life playing football in Stirling visit here 👇 https://t.co/vLfoiaJvKw

With thanks to @_dhaphotography we’ve this LUFC canvas, 120cm-60cm of the sunsetting over Elland Road. 

Simply make any donation to @LUFCFoodbank between now and Friday (5pm) to be in with a chance winning. 

Don’t forget to leave your name on the Just Giving page! https://t.co/9mb9QPVqMo https://t.co/gmyFUCav4e
@TheSquareBall even more lol https://t.co/km0pHYrPph
@TheSquareBall https://t.co/aX2TJGYGgO
Professional as always. https://t.co/2WVdH55g55
You know, due to @TheSquareBall releasing the same video for butter cup dec 3rd and 4th, I’m starting to think it’s all recorded on the same day 🤔
Pulisic looks so unlikely to score he must now be top of the Leeds list of potential strikers to buy in January. @TheSquareBall

Watching Netherlands USA and every time Robinson's name is mentioned all I hear is Ro Bin Son. Dam you @TheSquareBall 
#WorldButterCup

@wg0ldie I’ve now awaked and baked. Im smacked. It’s only 9:46am local, I have pit stains already because I genuinely am nervous for this match. I love you Tyler Adam’s, that’s my captain. Im listening to @TheSquareBall to distract myself- they’re talking about Dan James.
There's finally Leeds United merch at the @LevisStadium store! 🤩💙💛 https://t.co/MCQO9FbQWw

urls.title: The Square Ball: Season 33, Issue 04 | Bumper World Cup Special • The Square Ball
urls.description: Our fourth issue of 2022/23 is a bumper 118 page special World Cup issue, perfect to read while you wait for Leeds' season to restart.

tweets.text:
TSB World Cup Special!

Our fourth issue of 2022/23 is a bumper 118 page special World Cup issue, perfect to read while you wait for Leeds' season to restart.

Buying, reading and subscribing info here: https://t.co/u5cNwt1IGm #LUFC 

Cover by @_yelrA https://t.co/rWdsZ0TWeZ

@TheSquareBall if it’s ok can somebody DM me.  One of my friends works for a charity day one trauma and they have had a shirt donated by Patrick bamford going on auction Monday and wandered if you could RT the link to raise awareness.  I subscribe so feel like you owe me one haha
Leeds membership pack never disappoints 😂 #lufc https://t.co/jz44YD1vfC

urls.title: ‎Men In Blazers: Men in Blazers 12/01/22 with Jesse Marsch on Apple Podcasts
urls.description: ‎Show Men In Blazers, Ep Men in Blazers 12/01/22 with Jesse Marsch - Dec 1, 2022

tweets.text:
NEW POD. Rog and Leeds United manager @jessemarsch Preview the USMNT Round of 16 clash with the Netherlands. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

LISTEN HERE 🎧 https://t.co/gM3gXHW57k https://t.co/bqzWArUMOE
@TheSquareBall It was his total loss of composure when you spoke about Brendan’s potential bedroom antics that got me 😂
@TheSquareBall popey is buttercup royalty 😂😂

Excl: Leeds have reached an agreement with Pascal Struijk on new contract, it will be valid until 2027 — it’s done. 🚨⚪️🇳🇱 #LUFC

Documents are drafted — improved salary and new deal will be making Struijk one of key players of the club, after brilliant first part of the season. https://t.co/tFHN0xdEzM
@TheSquareBall Listening to @apopey regularly losing it on these World Butter Cup episodes is brilliant.
Am I the only person who is enjoying The World Butter Cup MORE than The World Cup 🏆  #WBC #WorldButterCup #TheSquareBall @TheSquareBall https://t.co/CNg7UOoxDZ
@TheSquareBall https://t.co/Gc7KMSskf3
@TheSquareBall How's the sizing on these ?
@TheSquareBall Also https://t.co/q6j24gJL0p
@TheSquareBall can I check, I buy TSB at 75 to 80 a year. Is there a merch discount on specifics, all or targeted items or should it discount when logged in please
@Johnyboylufc @TheSquareBall @Michael_TSB @apopey All the major questions get answered such as... https://t.co/pVzc9d3fgB
@ArenaFlowers @TheSquareBall rather accurate tbf…
